Articles.Content: No matter where i go the KSC main menu is stuck to my screen and the camera in the vab. I cannot build rockets as the vab menu will not show up and i cannot launch pre built rockets because the camera is stuck in the vab. Literally cannot do anything for the past few days. Is there a fix for this yet, have already tried starting a new campaign and reinstalling the game and it didn't work.

Yep, I have exactly the same problem. I tried steam-> search for corrupted files and I also Deletet all save files and all campaigns, startet new campaigns... dit nothing. I didn't delete and re-download the whole Game files, because my I-net is slow.
